snippet: The 96-board final of the women’s team trial for the second World Mind Sports Games ended late on Tuesday evening in Schaumburg, Ill.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played at the women’s team trial for the second World Mind Sports Games.
lead_paragraph: The 96-board final of the women’s team trial for the second World Mind Sports Games ended late on Tuesday evening in Schaumburg, Ill.
